channel.title: Home on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Festivals, Family, Friends & Food
item.description: Picture of veggies that I cut. How the call with dad is longer than usual. Had a topic to talk about. Till now, i always thought i can buy food - like i should mom this much amount for her “services”. But, I am realizing that its an activity and pretty common one at it. I can have a lot of discussions around this topic with almost anyone. Learn from them.
